I have 4.2U softmod.  This works great.  I got my system at 3.4U and softmodded originally with Twilight Hack.  I have issues with reading burn discs after upgrading to 4.2U, but I don't use burn discs anymore.  I use USB Loader GX.  I have it installed both as a channel and access on my SD card through HBC.  Some games give me an Error 002 using the channel.  Going through the HBC seems to clear that up. Not sure why, but it works.
in the WadManager, what IOS do i have to use to install the WADs?
nvm found it after a long google search. its 259
249* sorry for the typo

PAL testing results:
-N64 games work, region converted to PAL, not to region free. but SLOW as hell
-FEW wiiware games work, including megaman 9 and 10, world of goo
-other wiiware, like sudoku challenge, dont work in any region format (tested NTSC, PAL and region free)
-NeoGeo games work like a dream (tested with metal slug 2)
-internet channel seems to work at first, but freezes after a few seconds
-NES, SNES games DONT work

-> get a couple of wiiware games, and metal slug for sure
please someone make a PAL torrent of this

those from that page work perfectly, with no slowdowns or anything at all. some download links are down though.
"Rock N Roll Climber" PAL is the only game that didnt work so far

For those who are having problems modding their Wii, get Barnitos softmod v8 from HackMyWii (you'll need to download the hackmii installer from BootMii if you don't already have the Homebrew Channel installed, and NeoGamma from HackMyWii if you want a disc loader).  I used it to (re)mod my Wii, including upgrading from 4.1 to 4.2, and am not having any problems at all.  Just make sure to follow Barnito's instructions carefully, and you should be fine no matter which version of the Wii you have.

Oh, and nice torrent, btw.
